sections.heading: Order prohibiting payment of proceeds of saleWhen a third person has intervened and asserted a privilege on the property seized superior to that of the judgment creditor, the court shall order the sheriff to withhold a portion of the proceeds of the judicial sale of the property sufficient to satisf
sections.text: Order prohibiting payment of proceeds of saleWhen a third person has intervened and asserted a privilege on the property seized superior to that of the judgment creditor, the court shall order the sheriff to withhold a portion of the proceeds of the judicial sale of the property sufficient to satisfy the intervener's claim, subject to the further orders of the court.Amended by Acts 1961, No. 23, ยง1.
